title: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
alternative_title: マスエフェクト～失われたパラゴン
description: Early in the career of Alliance Marine James Vega, he leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against a mysterious alien threat known as The Collectors. Stationed at a colony in a remote star system, Vega and his soldiers must protect the civilians from a ruthless invasion determined to capture the population for unknown purposes.
